content: अभिधेय {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be named, mentioned, expressed &c.; वागेव मे नाभिधेयविषयमवतरति त्रपया <ls>K. 151</ls> words refuse, through shame, to express what I have to say. {@--2@} Nameable, as a category or predicament (in logic); अभिधेयाः पदार्थाः, अभिधेयत्वं पदार्थसामान्यलक्षणं. --यं {@--1@} Signification, meaning, sense, import; <ls>P. I. 1. 34</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Ki. 14. 5.</ls> {@--2@} A substance. {@--3@} The subject-matter; इहाभिधेयं सप्रयोजनं <ls>K. P. 1</ls>; इति प्रयोजनाभिधेयसंबंधाः <ls>Mugdha.</ls> {@--4@} The primary or literal sense of a word (= अभिधा); अभिधेयाविनाभूतप्रतीतिर्लक्षणोच्यते <ls>K. P. 2.</ls>
